model.tiles

Class HospitalTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.tiles.Tile
      • model.tiles.BuildableTile
        • model.tiles.HospitalTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destroyable, Evolvable

    public class HospitalTile
extends BuildableTile
    A building meant to improve the health situation of the city working on a specified budget
